about_the_game:
Eleanor has just turned eighteen and her life is about to change in many ways. She has to learn about her family's businesses, get along with her fiancée, and get accepted into a prestigious university, just to name a few things. And then there's the curious and exciting but maybe a little bit scary activity called sex. What exactly is it that adults do in the bedroom (and sometimes in other places)? Luckily, Eleanor is surrounded by wonderful maids who are more than willing to help her find that out...

Eleanor's Handmaid is a light-hearted visual novel with branching storylines, multiple endings, and rich background lore. Join Eleanor and her handmaid Sofia on their journey to find out what being an adult is all about!

Features (ver. 1.2.0):

  • Multiple branching storylines & 7 endings
  • Total length: 103 000 words (5-8 hours)
  • 35 unique event CGs, 471 variants
  • 1080p resolution
  • Unlockable CG & scene gallery
  • 100% human-made (no AI-generated content)

Characters:


Eleanor "Ella" D'Faerwyn is the heir of the Faerwyn noble family. She's dutiful and somewhat shy but usually lively and playful at home. She's very fond of her maids and treats them as family members rather than servants.

Sofia Firlake has been the handmaid of Eleanor her entire life. She's cheerful and often mischievous but extremely devoted to her mistress. Now that they are both adults, Sofia is hoping to take her relationship with Eleanor to the next level...

Helen Firlake is the chief maid of the Faerwyn family and the mother of Sofia and Laura. She has a dark past that she rarely talks about, but she's happy with her life now. She considers Julie her hero and has strong feelings of affection for Eleanor as well.


Julie D'Faerwyn is the current head of the Faerwyn family and the mother of Eleanor. She's a retired special forces captain who has found more pleasant (and pleasurable) ways of living her life in the past decade and a half. She's proud and powerful but generally amiable toward everyone around her.

Laura Firlake is a housemaid and the gardener of the Faerwyn family and Sofia's older half-sister. She's perceptive and well-informed but not very talkative. She considers both Eleanor and Sofia her little sisters.

Nerisha is a young adult succubus who has recently moved to Earth from the Underground and entered Lady Julie's service. She's liberal-minded and, unlike most succubi, views humans as her equals. She's rumored to be very "nice and cute."

highlighted.name: Ending 2: All You Need Is Two Loving Maids

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit depictions of consensual sex and uncensored genitals. All characters depicted are 18 years old or older.

The story takes place in a female-only fantasy world, in which all women are able to magically become "futanari," i.e., grow male genitals.

The adult scenes in this game are either female x female (~35%) or futanari x female (~65%).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86_64/Arm
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Eleanor's Handmaid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Eleanor's Handmaid is a romantic and erotic slice-of-life visual novel about a young noblewoman and her handmaid who have just reached adulthood.
